content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide a detailed solution.

Analysis of Main Target Image:
- The structure consists of 6 blocks in total
- It has orange (red) and blue blocks
- There are effectively 2 layers: ground level and the vertical tower
- The central piece is a tall orange cylinder with a triangular top
- Two blue rectangular blocks are placed on opposite sides of the central tower
- Three triangular/wedge-shaped orange pieces surround the structure

Block Selection and Spatial Arrangement:
1. Central tower: Block #4 (vertical orange cylinder) with Block #12 (triangular top)
2. Blue blocks: Block #2 and Block #3 (rectangular blue blocks)
3. Side wedges: Block #14 and Block #15 (orange triangular pieces)

Assembly Order (from bottom up):
{
    Step1: Move block with index 4    // Place central cylinder
    Step2: Move block with index 2    // Place first blue block on left
    Step3: Move block with index 3    // Place second blue block on right
    Step4: Move block with index 14   // Place first triangular piece
    Step5: Move block with index 15   // Place second triangular piece
    Step6: Move block with index 12   // Place top triangular piece
}

This assembly sequence ensures stability and creates the exact structure shown in the target image, matching all rotational orientations as shown in the block dictionary.
